messages.title: commitment
messages.content: I will continue to dedicate myself solely to carrying out my duties as a Member of Parliament and will not seek or accept any other positions.

messages.title: constituents
messages.content: I will on all occasions put the interest of my constituents ahead of personal and political considerations.

messages.title: consultation
messages.content: I will regularly consult with my constituents on issues of national or local importance that affect them.

messages.title: communication
messages.content: I will maintain a fully staffed office and effective communications system so that I am easily accessible to my constituents.

messages.title: co-operation
messages.content: I will work and co-operate with all political parties, public bodies, businesses, voluntary organisations and individuals in the interests of my constituents.

images.caption: Geraldine Smith - Local Voice - Local Choice

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet provides Geraldine's pledge to the people, outlining her commitment, approach to serving constituents, consultation policy, communication strategy, and willingness to co-operate across parties and organizations.
